archimate:Requirement.name: TS.1.1.9b: b) management of technical infrastructure (e.g. to help in the development of a secure technical infrastructure, and assist in the review and analysis of the existing technical infrastructure)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
